intro: A magical adventure where a curious turtle, a clumsy dinosaur, and an inventive hummingbird travel through enchanted lands to restore harmony to their home.
description:
Embark with Tula the turtle, Riko the absent-minded velociraptor, and Luzia the inventor hummingbird on a magical and colorful audio visual novel, where every page comes to life with 3D animations and voice-overs.

Guided by a map, the three friends navigate through walkable forests, bubble showers, and crystalline silk bridges to restore harmony to time.

Inspired by the style of top-rated interactive stories, this adventure combines reading, tactile play, and immersive music to turn every play session into a moment of learning and family bonding.

Highlights
· Full-color 3D illustrations that amaze with every touch.

· Full narration with voices and fun music.

· Touch interactivity: tap the screen to turn the page or view fun images in the gallery.

· Simple controls: perfect for first-time digital readers as a family.

· An upbeat story that celebrates curiosity, ingenuity, and the importance of growing by remembering the best of each moment.

· Short games, autosave, and auto-read mode: ideal for bedtime stories or road trips.
